issue.title: [IR] [C++] Add explicit cast node to IR
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14143](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14143). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The DuckDB folks have requested that `CAST` be added as its own `Expression` variant.

`CAST` it isn't well modeled as a function call due to it requiring a type argument, which can't be modeled as an `Expression`.
